title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers
Interview Descriptions: Good process. This is mostly just to fill out information because the system requires. I’m sure this company is decent but I don’t actually know anything about them. More words here
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Manager - Performance Improvement Advisory Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers
Interview Descriptions: Seemed a bit disorganized. Recruiter and interviewer shared different things about the role  and areas of responsibility which lead to distrust in the work environment. After 2 interviews I got an email that they hired internally for the role
Interview Questions: What is my experience leading large projects?

title: RN New Grad Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Torrance, CA) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had to take online questions and then schedule an interview after that.  The interview took 30 minutes. There were four interviewers asking multiple questions about personal development, patient care responses and values.  Overall, it was very difficult.
Interview Questions: Case studies and ask me what I should do.

title: Operations Chief Operating Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers
Interview Descriptions: Seemless, professional learned a lot about the mission vission value of organization. Team work and a stable company to grow with company was very informative about external internal goals i would work here
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Chicago, IL) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: I had to fill out about 5 forms and read their mission statement, then I interviewed with the HR rep and another interview with the Unit manager. I did not get a tour around the facility.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself

title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers
Interview Descriptions: Received a phone call from HR to schedule an interview. On the day of the interview I filled out some initial paperwork and spoke with HR. Had an interview with the department head and was taken on a tour of the facilities.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself
How would your friends describe you?

title: Transportation Aid Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was great,  I was nervous but they made me feel welcome. They didn't grill me or make me feel as if I was wasting their time. The on boarding process was great to.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for this company?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Oak Lawn, IL)
Interview Descriptions: Fast turnaround time for an interview after applying online. I met with HR first and then was sent to interview with the clinic manager to interview there as well all in the same day. You do take a skills test during the interview process.
Interview Questions: Experience in the role I was applying for.

title: Transportation Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Oak Lawn, IL) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and within a week I was called for an interview. The interview process went very quickly and smoothly. I met with HR first. We discussed my resume and then more abstract questions about what I plan to do with my future. It went really well. Next I met with the hiring manager. She also went through my resume. She picked different questions off of a list. It went well also.
Interview Questions: If asked, how would those close to you describe you?

title: Human Resources Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Evergreen Park, IL)
Interview Descriptions:
My interviewer was very nice and friendly. I didn't feel like I was being drilled, rather just asked to share my story and experiences. I was very comfortable the whole time. The questions were very open ended, and required creative and original answers. It's important to know the answers to technical questions associated with the job you are interviewing for, but also be prepared to be yourself and show your personality! 

There is some paperwork involved in the interview process, so be sure to come early and prepared!
Interview Questions: Why did you chose to go into this field of work?

title: Registration Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (San Pedro, CA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, got an email to submit a prerecorded interview, called in for an in person interview. One week of training outside of job location, one week on the job training.
Interview Questions: When was a time that you gave excellent customer service to a patient

title: Registered Respiratory Therapist (RRT) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (San Pedro, CA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Smooth fast and pleasant. The manager was professional and thoroughly explained the goals for the staff as well as the dept. There were team players who were sweet as cake.
Interview Questions: Tell me a bit about yourself

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Evergreen Park, IL) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview was very easy and laid back. Was prepared to answer the hard questions that are expected but I felt as though my interviewer talked more than I did. About the position and her career history, which was refreshing, nice, and helpful. HR called to offer me the job within 4 hours or so of the interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in this role?

title: Information Systems Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Evergreen Park, Cook, IL)
Interview Descriptions: A wonderful and great experience, direct and to the point, made you feel comfortable and at ease. They mentioned that little company of mary is a value based organization and that is great to work for.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to transfer to this position?

title: Practice Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Evergreen Park, IL) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Primary interview with HR generalist
Secondary interview with Manager/ Supervisor
Waited 3 weeks for final reply, HR was way behind on follow up process.
Overall expericence was fair.
Director of Operations was retiring and made sure that I was placed in my position and trained
Interview Questions: What made you interested  in working at LCMH

title: E R Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Evergreen Park, IL) in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions: Interview was very standard for the industry. I was asked experience based questions and was given a walk through of the E.R. at the end of the interview. Very friendly, non-stress interview. Be able to describe what makes you qualified to work in a faced paced emergency room situation.
Interview Questions: previous expiernce

title: Radiology Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: waiting for interview takes few weeks, when you have you go first through the Human Resource office, than interview one on one. Asking many different questions including some situation questions. They may be hard to answer because you never know what is correct answer.
Interview Questions: situation question - hard to answer correctly

title: Physical Therapist I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Evergreen Park, Cook, IL) in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: Little Company of Mary is a community hospital with prospects to expand.  The company has a robust history and known to always put patients first.  Since it is a community hospital, my interview was with the director of the department whom was friendly, knowledgeable and approachable.  The interview was very casual and did run through the usual standard questions.  I feel the interview was mainly to get a sense of your personality and if and how well you fit in with the culture and work style of the company.
Interview Questions: Standard questions included strengths and weaknesses, patient scenario questions and standard procedure questions.  It is all about the safety of patients.

title: Ekg Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers (Torrance, CA) in May 2009
Interview Descriptions: I applied at the behest of a friend who knew the company was looking for someone for this position. I had recently undergone industry training for the same job so it was I applied. The hiring manager was nice and effectively communicated the requirements. The folks in HR were very cold, cut and dry. Glad I didn't have to work with them.
Interview Questions: Most difficult question dealt with a scenario in which I knew a superior was wrong and how I would react.

title: Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Little Company of Mary Hospital & Health Care Centers in Feb 2009
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, phone interview, then online intervie, then threee person panel interview
Interview Questions: Mission statement is important, how do you relate?
